title: My friend got hack, What can i do?
body:
My friend is on vacation this week and he asked me to reach him Silver this season, i did it and today i tryed to play on his account to play more rank to get him S1 but someone as change to password i asked him and he didn't change it. I saw him connection and the hacker talk and we talk in Espagnol (my friend doesn't speak espagnol) And now he blocked me what can i do?

Here some screenshot from ours conversation (im a bit salty)

Thx for answer me the faster you can

replies.body:
None of this is okay.  :(  Playing on your friend's account to boost him can legitimately result in his account getting banned-[ we don't support boosting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751834).  Having access to his account, or sharing account information with others, is a sure way for occurrences like **this** to happen.  

I know you want to help your friend, but his best bet is to contact us directly through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  It is in his best interest that you **stop using his account**, otherwise this issue won't have a happy ending.  :/  Have him contact us directly and we'll be happy to help.

I've also edited out the links for privacy reasons.
Ok I understand, im just friendly guys i don't want to have any problem for helping my friend climbing
